Why
participate?

topics.title: Team
topics.description: At least one designer and one dev on the team. Maximum of 5 people.

topics.title: Certificates
topics.description: For each team member completing the delivery.

topics.title: Ideas
topics.description: You can choose to implement a bounty from getsitedone.pro OR come up with your own idea. Professional sites (from a client of yours) are fine as long as you have the authorization to do so.

topics.title: Bounty
topics.description: More than one person can make the same bounty/idea.

banners.textDescription:
One-Page Websites

Criteria: Design, Editability, Performance﻿

Tie-Breaker: Creativity

mentors.content: As the founding software engineer at deco.cx, Gaudencio has spearheaded educational initiatives and provided crucial support. Prior to this role, he served as a licensed computer science teacher at UFCG, where he took on responsibilities for chairs in web development and infrastructure. Additionally, Gaudencio led Public-Private Partnership (PPP) projects with industry giants like Lenovo and VTEX. With a decade-long tenure at UFCG, Matheus impacted the lives of over 1000 students.

Tiago is a software developer with a solid academic background, having graduated from Ecole Polytechnique in Paris and obtained a master's degree in Artificial Intelligence from HKUST. Over the past six years, he has dedicated his expertise to web development and optimizing frontend performance at leading ecommerce solutions. His journey reflects a commitment to staying updated with technological advances, enabling him to navigate the dynamic field of software development.

Luciano Júnior, a.k.a Lucis, has been coding since he was 7 and is passionate about creating simple solutions of make people's lives better. He is an advocate of the Web and has experience in building multi-tenant scalable applications, especially with his favorite language: Typescript. Lucis is also passionate about education, having mentored and lectured in his area since his college degree in Computer Science at UFCG. He follows the mantra "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication".

items.answer: deco.cx is the web builder for the Post-AI era. It is a modern alternative to WordPress built with TypeScript, React and Tailwind
items.question: What's deco.cx?

items.answer: Absolutely, if you intent to enroll more than 5 students from the same company, please reach out.
items.question: Do you have group discounts?

items.answer: You should know React or a similar component-based framework. Desirably you also know TypeScript and Tailwind.
items.question: What are the pre-requisites for enrolling?

items.answer: After submitting your final PR, we will take 10-15 business days to review it.
items.question: How long does it takes to get my certification?

items.answer: You will have all tools and methods needed to create a fully integrated, high-performance digital experience such as stores already powered by deco.cx.
items.question: What will I be able to build after decoCamp?

items.answer: Sure thing! You can choose between a regular student and get access only to the content or becoming an Official Certified Partner.
items.question: Can I have access to the content without getting certified?

items.answer: Currently, deco.camp is held in both Portuguese and English.
items.question: In which language is decoCamp taught?
